06-30-2020 08:23 PM
I received a couple of very annoying ads a few days after I started using my Note 10+, all of them from Samsung itself. It really upset me, and it was kind of hard to find in int… [+222 chars]

articles.title: Vizio's OLED TVs with HDMI 2.1 to launch this fall, starting at $1300 - FlatpanelsHD
articles.description: Will be cheaper than LG's most affordable OLED TVs
articles.content:
Vizio will launch its first OLED TVs this fall. The TVs will be equipped with HDMI 2.1 ports and VRR features, and will be cheaper than LG's most affordable OLED TVs.
